1:
Yahweh, I am crying out to you; come quickly to me.
\q Listen to me when I call to you.
\q
2:
May my prayer be like incense before you;
\q may my lifted hands be like the evening sacrifice.
4:
Do not let my heart desire any evil thing
\q or participate in sinful activities
\q with men who behave wickedly.
\q May I not eat any of their delicacies.
5:
Let a righteous man hit me; it will be a kindness to me.
\q Let him correct me; it will be like oil on my head;
\q may my head not refuse to accept it.
\q But my prayer is always against their wicked deeds.
\q
7:
They will have to say, "As when one plows and breaks up the ground,
\q so our bones have been scattered at the mouth of Sheol."
9:
Protect me from the snares that they have laid for me,
\q from the traps of evildoers.
\q
10:
Let the wicked fall into their own nets
\q while I escape.
